desc: Hello Guys. I have an IT company in Afghanistan. There is a big project that I can't do it with the team I have. There is a UN Base in Kabul with a lot of security. They have got a meeting room and want to computerise the place. It is a place like a Parliament in which 200 participants can join an event. They are about to buy tablets for each seat and place it under their desk. Most probably these tablets will be Android. Our company is responsible to make a system with following details:[url removed, login to view]:a. The System will allow certain users (e.g. House Leader) to set the Agenda.b. All Members of the House will be able to view the Agenda.c. The Agenda information will be saved in the system.d. If possible and required, the Agenda information will be synced to the existinge. Conference System.f. The Agenda information can be set and viewed in 3 languages i.e. English, Persianand Pashto.(I can help with Persian and Pashto translation and etc)2. Communication:a. The System will allow certain users (e.g. House Leader) to send Publicb. Announcements.c. All Members of the House will be able to send and receive messages.d. Messages can be typed or written.e. Messages can be typed in 3 Languages i.e. English, Dari and Persian3. Votinga. The System will allow certain users (e.g. House Leader) to define and Start Voting.b. All Members of the House will be participating in the vote in one of the two ways.i. Member places his/her finger on a fingerprint reader andthen presses a button on the voting panel. The fingerprint readeris not available today and needs to be installed and integratedwith the existing Conference System.ORii. Members places his/her finger on a tablet to enter the system andthen uses the Voting tab to submit his/her Vote. The Voting tabwill show icons (e.g. Red, Green, White cards) to allow selecting a Votec. The System will allow viewing Voting Results.d. Vote definition and Voting Results will be supported in 3 languages Pashto, Persian and English.4. Knowledge Basea. The System will present information on relevant Laws, Rules and Members.b. The information, in multiple languages, will be entered using a terminal.c. The information will be available in 3 languages. Pashto, Persian and English.Important Notes:1)If necessary we might need you to travel to Kabul for installation and etc.(Don't worry it is not the worst place to travel and we will take care of you the best way). There is another option if you can train some of our guys we might come to your place.2)We would like to award the project to some one or company from India or Pakistan as the travel is easier and cheaper.3)We can help you with Persian and Pashto part so no worries on that.4) Please give us a brief explanation on how you wanna do it.
title: Meeting Room Computerisation Process

Thanks

desc: I'm trying to make an Augmented Reality project in Unity for iOS that uses the label on a can as the target image.  When Vuforia recognizes the can, I want to overlay a transparent video label so that only part of the can animates.  I have the app working, and the video label looks seamless in Unity, but in the real-world, the transparent video floats slightly above the can, so it doesn't look seamless.   My approach was to make a transparent cylinder the child of the target cylinder, and the transparent video is wrapped around the child cylinder that appears upon recognition.  However, I feel like there must be a better approach, perhaps without using this child cylinder at all.  I need a seamless look, like the video below:[url removed, login to view]I'm willing to pay someone to complete / fix my project, or even to give me advice on the correct approach to make this a seamless augmentation.
title: Unity & Vuforia Augmented Label on a Can

desc: I want to create a social media platform that incorporates aspects of Vine and Snapchat stories. People will post an 8 second video which will last for a period of 48 hours. The post will have the option to be liked, reposted, or commented on. In addition, each like or repost will give the post more than the allotted 48 hour lifespan. Each like would add an additional 5 minutes and each repost would add 15 minutes. Once the post receives a total of 48 hours worth of likes and reposts, the post will become permanent. The user should also be able to purchase additional time for their post but the purchased time will not contribute to the 48 hours necessary for the post to be permanent.
title: Build me an App

desc: We are a small real estate training business. We run a 90 day productivity program where agents submit weekly productivity sheets that are then collated. The sheets are at this stage provided as a hard copy and agents complete by hand before scanning through to us each week. We are looking for an online solution or app that would allow agents to update these details online then the form is submitted or closed or sent through each week over a 12 week period. There could be 10 to 100 agents at any one time on the program. There will be a 3 - 5 programs over the year that we will call "cycles" and some may overlap so the submitted forms would need to show the agent and what program they are on when the details are submitted eg "Cycle One".
title: Productivity Booklet

desc: Looking to have a game developed where the player controls Santas sleigh and tries to deliver gifts to peoples' house while driving the sleigh quickly the sunny/snowy/icy/leaf/ and traffic-covered streets. All the whole dodging cars, accidents, snow drifts, and searching for speedups, present and ornament currency, THis currency will allow the user to purchase speedups, different sleigh design, colors, different avatar outfits, and additional reindeer for even faster attempts. There is a 3 gift (or 3 stars) rating system for each level, free boosts every 12 to 24 hours (to encourage repeat login), timers for the level, where a minimum time is required to progress to the next level and unlock additional levels as well as a "deliver' meter for teaching level where the player is rated by how many of the presents they successfully delivered. In addition to campaign mode, I want to have developed and an 'endless' mode where the player keeps driving until the sleigh's hp runs out and it crashes.For the endless mode, i'd like to have a top score list, and possibly a feature where the 1 person in the top 10 is entered into a drawing and 1 is (randomly) chosen to receive a REAL gift card once every month. position 1 gets 10 entries, 2nd place gets 9, 3rd place gets 8, etc all the way to 10th place gets 1 entry into the drawing.The microtransaction store will feature outfits for the character, decorations for the sleigh, companions to help with gifts (like elves) reindeer to speed up the sleigh, and extra speed or hit point boots for the sleigh as well.Only developers/teams that can do both the programming and the graphics apply.
title: Christmas themed running/paperboy style game for ios/ipad/windows/android

desc: I need an iPhone app. with ability to sign up to a membership area, retain data, accept payment, send email / text reminders.
title: H2O to go go

desc: Looking for a diner dash type of game to be developed which is functionally similar to games like diner dash. However, instead of a diner, the game is located in a shopping mall gift wrapping station. The whole game would be feature Christmas themed with gift wrapping tables, a customer service /supply counter (instead of a kitchen) and different wrapping positions per tables and different colors (red blue green purple yellow) and a fast wrap minigame where you use the touchscreen to race a competing gift wrapping employee.  After a successful wrapping job the customer tips the player and the player cleans up the table for the net customer - which is how you accrue more money to buy better materials (wrapping paper, scissors, tape, bows/ribbon, mp3 player and speakers ) and the better the materials the more customers you attract and the more those customers tip.Also included: a map of the 'mall' where the gift wrapping would occur for progressiona player profile where people can tailor the appearance and accessories of the character.available microtransactions for items (can be decided later speed boots, items to slow the countdown timer in the head-to-head gift wrapping challenge etc, and custom costumes -and costume pieces to purchase from the store - e.g. a Santa suit, and an elf hat) so you can dress your character in a profile screen, and a star (1, 2, 3) ranking system for each level determine the speed of service and the amount you can tip.the game would also allow for sharing on social media, posting, inviting friends etc.Open to different setup style options
title: Diner Dash Style gift wrapping mobile game for ios/ipad/windows/android
